name: phpproject
description: ``` use Core\App; use Core\Database; ``` ### 2. get the database using this line ``` $db = App::resolve(Database::class); ``` ### 3. perform a query using the query method (u can chain find method or findOrfail) and store the result in a variable  ``` $note = $db->query("select * from notes where id=:id",['id'=>$_POST['id']])->find(); ```
